Room.Name: Brownhaven Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Brownhaven Way, one of the more respectable throughfares.
Room.LongDescription: Not far to the south you can see the entrance to a village concert hall. The people of Brownhaven pride themselves on their understanding of culture, and try to attend most of the recitals given here. Unfortunately, they often have good excuses for not attending, so generally only a few patrons can be found at any particular evening. But if you are really looking for a good time, the Boar's Tit Pub is popular every night.
